Method Detail

setTimer

public void setTimer(int delay)
Sets the delay between timer events.

Parameters:
delay - Delay between timer events in milliseconds. Use zero or a negative value to stop the timer. Don't call this method directly. It is used by the SEngine.

setTimerHandler

public void setTimerHandler(SEngineTimerHandler timerHandler)
Sets the timer handler. Don't call this method directly. It is used by the SEngine.

Parameters:
timerHandler - the handler to set
